name: Speed Car Racing - Driving
description:
Speed Car Racing - Driving is not that easy, but if you are an extreme car racer, you will have fun no less than the real driving. Your speed driving has no hurdles except the other traffic cars. Set a countdown for the players who consider them to be the best city drivers and give them a hard time.
Features
- Easy to learn and drive
- 3D realistic cockpit view
- Endless game mode
- Different locations and cars to choose
- Simulator-like controls
